name: electron-handwrite-demo
description: Multi-touch handwriting whiteboard with native GPU rendering (WebGPU/wgpu)

scripts.build:wasm: cargo build --manifest-path src/renderer/wasm/ink_engine/Cargo.toml --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir src/renderer/wasm/ink_engine/pkg src/renderer/wasm/ink_engine/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/ink_engine.wasm
